short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interim integration for a Optimizely DAM picker that works with Optimizely SaaS CMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly integrate Optimizely SaaS CMS with Optimizely DAM! This extension provides an interim solution for a smooth and efficient media selection process right within your CMS workflow.

Fields need to follow the following namimg conventions:

`dam_fid_{folderid}_{fieldname}` e.g. `dam_fid_123456_Headshot`

Note: Another field will need changing for Visual Builder to update
